title: Oru Kannadiya Lyrics Ya Ya Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Oru Kannadiya
Singer(s): Karthik
Movie: Ya ya
Music: Vijay Ebenezer


Friend-o prinji ponaan
figure-o vittu ponaaa
engae povomada, engae povom
engae povom..

Oru kannaadiya oru kadhalthaan
pottu odachaale, en kannu munnaal
oru kaagithama ennudaya natapayumthaan
potu erichaaney, avan rendu kannaala

natpu peru sonnadhu yaaru
ellaam poiyaa odi pochuda
Kadhal uyiru endru vazhndhaen
ellaam ingae kannaamoodchi kaatuthada

othayila poren, othayila poren
sathiyama naanum bakiyavaan da (2)

rendu peraala ellaam pochu
ellaam ennaalathaan

Friend-o prinji ponaan
figure-o vittu ponaaa
engae povomada, engae povom
engae povom..

nanban oruthan irundha podhum
naatula ellaarum sonnaangada
ennakum oruthan frienda irundhaan
avanayum ippa kaanomada

THunayaa nenachen, verya mudichen
thozha unnakelaam manase illa

kanna thudaikum en nanba
kannil mannalli potutiyeda ...

othayila poren, othayila poren
sathiyama naanum bakiyavaan da (2)

rendu peraala ellaam pochu
ellaam ennaalathaan

Oru kannaadiya oru kadhalthaan
pottu odachaale, en kannu munnaal
oru kaagithama ennudaya natapayumthaan
potu erichaaney, avan rendu kannaala

Kahdali oruthi kadachaa podhum
elaa kaviyum sonnaangada
Kanvaula avala kadavula nenachen
ellaam maayam maayam thaANDAAA
